item.title: Jennifer add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I always advise children who ask me for tips on being a writer to read as much as they possibly can. Jane Austen gave a young friend the same advice, so I'm in good company there." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Thomas Merton
item.description: "The beginning of love is the will to let those we love be perfectly themselves, the resolution not to twist them to fit our own image." -- Thomas Merton

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Janet Dailey
item.description: "Someday is not a day of the week." -- Janet Dailey

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Lillian Hellman
item.description: "I cannot and will not cut my conscience to fit this year's fashions." -- Lillian Hellman

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You must write every single day of your life... You must lurk in libraries and climb the stacks like ladders to sniff books like perfumes and wear books like hats upon your crazy heads... may you be in love every day for the next 20,000 days. And out of that love, remake a world." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "If you hide your ignorance, no one will hit you and you'll never learn." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "Your intuition knows what to write, so get out of the way." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Michael Ondaatje
item.description: "We all have an old knot in the heart we wish to untie." -- Michael Ondaatje

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Edith Wharton
item.description: "My little old dog a heart-beat at my feet" -- Edith Wharton

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by David McCullough
item.description:
"To me, history ought to be a source of pleasure. It isn't just part of our civic responsibility. To me, it's an enlargement of the experience of being alive, just the way literature or art or music is."
[<i>The Title Always Comes Last</i>; NEH 2003 Jefferson Lecturer interview profile]" -- David McCullough

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by David McCullough
item.description: "Real success is finding your lifework in the work that you love." -- David McCullough

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Elizabeth Kostova
item.description: "It was good to walk into a library again; it smelled like home." -- Elizabeth Kostova

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Elizabeth Kostova
item.description: "It's funny; in this era of e-mail and voice mail and all those things that even I did not grow up with, a plain old paper letter takes on amazing intimacy." -- Elizabeth Kostova

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Elizabeth Kostova
item.description: "In the end, I always act from the heart, even if I also value reason and tradition. I wish I could explain why, but I don't know." -- Elizabeth Kostova

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Elizabeth Kostova
item.description: "I've always been interested in foreign relations. It's my belief that study of history should be our preparation for understanding the present rather than an escape from it." -- Elizabeth Kostova

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Kazuo Ishiguro
item.description: "There was another life that I might have had, but I am having this one." -- Kazuo Ishiguro

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "What do we say to the Lord of Death?" "Not today." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies but the pack survives." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Conan O'Brien
item.description: "If you work really hard, and you're kind, amazing things will happen." -- Conan O'Brien

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "I write to give myself strength. I write to be the characters that I am not. I write to explore all the things I'm afraid of. " -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Recognizing power in another does not diminish your own." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Don’t give people what they want, give them what they need." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "You take people, you put them on a journey, you give them peril, you find out who they really are." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "The hardest thing in this world, is to live in it." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Ovid
item.description: "Perfer et obdura, dolor hic tibi proderit olim." (Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you.)" -- Ovid
